alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CUSTER AND SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM MDT... At 815 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palmer Gulch Resort, or over Hill City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Keystone, Keystone Wye, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Black Elk Peak, Horse Thief Lake, and northeastern Custer State Park around 820 PM MDT. Black Hills Playhouse and Center Lake around 830 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include State Game Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
